Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/boot

../                      Parent directory
!INDEX.html              Long index format
dualboot/                boot Linux from other OSs
ethernet/                tools for booting Linux over Ethernet
init/                    init-time programs to start system services after boot
lilo/                    autoboots from a hard drive w/ menu choice of os
loaders/                 non-lilo interactive boot loaders
patch-non640k-2.0.36.gz  allows 2.0.10 to boot on machines with < 640k conv mem
